title: Fell off the Segway
text: This afternoon I had a little mishap and fell off my Segway. Thankfully, I'm okay! Just a few scrapes and bruises. It was a reminder to always wear protective gear and stay cautious while riding.

title: Recommendation Algorithms Workshop
text: I've been working on the recommendation algorithm workshop for RhythmHacks 2025. Check out more here: https://github.com/adamstirtan/rhythmhacks2025

title: Diablo
text:
# Diablo

Diablo is a classic action RPG that has influenced many games since its release. It was one of the first games that brought me online with friends to explore dungeons together. I have such fond memories of it.

> "Stay awhile and listen!" - Deckard Cain

This quote always brings back nostalgia for me whenever I hear it.

title: PlayStation Modding
text: In high school, I used to mod other people's PlayStations. It was a fun way to learn about hardware and software modifications. I enjoyed the challenge of figuring out how to unlock new features and play games for free.
